Description.Text: The Zoes Studios offers 48 modern and comfortable Superior Studios (10 with interconnecting sound proofed doors) that can accommodate 2, 3, or 4 people. All rooms are the same size (32 sq. m.) and have private bathroom (shower, WC), air conditioning (extra charge payable locally), safe box (with extra charge), Satellite flat TV with English, Russian & more Channels, fridge, fully equipped kitchenette with all the necessary cooking facilities, direct telephone line, hair dryer, Wi-Fi (extra charge payable locally), and a furnished balcony, all with garden, mountain, sea and pool views.

The Hotel is a well equipped complex with spacious Studio rooms, and is close to a number of attractions and places of interest such as the Afandou Golf course (2.5 km), Kallithea Therme (6km) Rhodes town (15 km), the Acropolis of Rhodes, Grand Master Palace, Aquarium, Modern Art Gallery, Water Park (5km) Casino, Water Sports & more
